description: When there are large number of VMs in the cloud, there is a performance issue on restarting of nova compute. Compute server tries to sync states of all the vm and does not respond until sync is complete.
title: performance issue on restart of nova compute when there are  a large number of vms

comments.content: When there are large number of VMs in the could there is a performance issue on restarting of nova compute. Compute server tries to sync states of all the vm and does not respond until sync is complete.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~syerrapragada

comments.content: This bug isn't just specific to vmware this occurs on kvm as well. The issue is that when nova starts it queries neutron for the nw information of each instance running on the compute node one at a time. We actually don't need to query neutron for this and instead we should just fetch it from the instance_info_cache table as the nw_info is there.
